result.execSummary:
The defendant Kristine Elizabeth Henry was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • OWI (5th or 6th) [Modifiers: Penalty - Operating While under the Influence (5th+ Offense)], a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 346.63(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Complete an AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommendations.

1:22  PM Defendant Kristine Elizabeth Henry in court, in custody.  Attorney Jordan Lippert in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Claire M Edwards in court for Kristine Elizabeth Henry. 22CF22 and 22TR274-276 called.  Information reading waived.  Defendant plead no contest.  Rights/elements.  Sentencing statements.  in 22CF22, court imposed 18 months initial confinement, 36 months extended supervision,  Eligible for Challenge and Substance Abuse.  Conditions of extended supervision:  Maintain absolute sobriety.  36 month revocation, 36 month interlock, AODA, DNA sample, $2323.00.  99 days good time.  22CF44 dismissed and read in.  22TR273-276 dismissed.  2:05pm Recess
